title: laptop
content: do we need one for 1st year or is it fine if i get one in 2nd year?

comments.body: Check the FAQs. Don't buy a new laptop if you already have a working one
At this point, ppl dont know how to use the search button or they are blind to even read the FAQs
it kinda works, but its not rlly smooth or fast and it has only 8gb ram and its abt 3 yrs old now and it wasnt a new model back then either-
As I said, read the FAQs. You will get your answer on whether you need a new one.
